name: express-react-ts-starter
description: Starter TypeScript project with Express backend and React frontend

scripts.buildshared: yarn install --cwd shared; tsc -p shared --skipLibCheck; echo '===== Finished Building Shared ====='
scripts.buildclient: yarn install --cwd client; cd client; webpack; cd ..; echo '===== Finished Building Client ====='
scripts.buildserver: yarn install --cwd server; tsc -p server --skipLibCheck; echo '===== Finished Building Server ====='
scripts.postinstall: npm run buildshared; npm run buildclient; npm run buildserver

author: Rick Delhommer
